title: Red Glow Icon pack for LP
creator: eomada

extendedInfo.description: Red Glow icon pack for "Launcher Pro" and "Launcher Pro Plus" LPPThis is a set of basic Red Glow icons inspired by TRON to be used with the latest version of Launcher Pro / plusOnce you install this you can set the icon theme by pressing Menu while on the home screen, thenPreferences < Theme settings < Icon Pack < Red GlowYou will be prompted to restart launcher pro. Once you do it the icons should now have changed to the Red Glow theme.Please note that I have not done icons for all applications. Icons are available for a limited set of basic android applications for now.I would like your constructive feedback and feel free to send me your request for any particular set of applications you would like me to create icons for. I will try best to design and update them ASAP.Please send me the application name and the activity if possible :) This will make things easier for me and also enable a faster update hereemail : developer.eomada@gmail.comDo check out the new unique icon theme with over 250 icons. Splash Icon pack for lp & lpphttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.eomada.splashicons&feature=search_result

reviews.title: Doesnt work at all
reviews.comment: Galaxy nexus running paradigm 3.2.5  jelly bean, doesnt work at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Duped
reviews.comment: What\'s there is nice, but let alone that there aren\'t many icons...what IS there has duplicates between 2 to as many as 4 copies. Not worth wasting your time with.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Splash Icons better
reviews.comment: Some ppl myt like it in Red. But I like the developer\'s other icon pack, \"Splash icons\" Amazing and Unique
reviews.author: A Google User
